Content: Equipment and units should have different usability states on planets.
So on some planets a ship may fully functional on others it may only be
limited. Limited may mean it can not fly trough storms or so. This
implies that there are operational parameter with ranges for equipment
(so optimal range, acceptable range, limited range). For planes the
parameter may be the air density or the amount of dust, for ships the
